```coq
intros l m0 m1 Hpt_map_msg Hm1_in_filterMap.
apply in_map_iff in Hm1_in_filterMap.
destruct Hm1_in_filterMap as [m' [Hm'_in_l Hpt_map_msg_m']].
rewrite Hpt_map_msg_m' in Hpt_map_msg.
apply pt_map_msg_injective in Hpt_map_msg; trivial.
Qed.

original: intros l m0 m1 Hpt_map_msg Hm1_in_filterMap. apply in_map_iff in Hm1_in_filterMap. destruct Hm1_in_filterMap as [m' [Hm'_in_l Hpt_map_msg_m']]. rewrite Hpt_map_msg_m' in Hpt_map_msg. apply pt_map_msg_injective in Hpt_map_msg; trivial.
